articles.title: SK hynix Honored with Two Major Titles at GSA Awards 2025
articles.description: Company named 'Best Financially Managed Semiconductor Company (Achieving Greater than $1 Billion in Annual Sales)' and 'Outstanding Asia-Pacific Semiconductor Company' simultaneouslyAccelerates recovery from market downturn leveraging world-class HBM leadership; Global management performance recognized Reflects company's technology leadership and customer-centric executionSK Chairman Chey Tae-won emphasizes: 'Technological competitiveness must remain unwavering in challenging times' Commits to driving new customer value and leading global AI market growth as a 'Full-Stack AI Memory Creator'SEOUL, South Korea, Dec. 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- SK hynix Inc. (or 'the company', www.skhynix.com) announced today that it has been named the winner of the Best Financially Managed Semiconductor Company Award (Achieving Greater than $1 Billion in Annual Sales)[1] and the Outstanding Asia-Pacific Semiconductor Company Award[2] at the Global Semiconductor Alliance (GSA)[3] Awards 2025, held on December 4 PST in Santa Clara, California.**media[857348]**
articles.content:
Company named "Best Financially Managed Semiconductor Company (Achieving Greater than $1 Billion in Annual Sales)" and "Outstanding Asia-Pacific Semiconductor Company" simultaneously
Accelerates recovery from market downturn leveraging world-class HB... [3951 chars]

articles.title: India International Science Festival: India rapidly progressing in field of science and technology: Shubhanshu
articles.description: While interacting with students and science enthusiasts during a session at the four-day India International Science Festival (IISF) which commenced in Panchkula on Saturday, Shukla urged them to pursue science and space research with determination.
articles.content: Indian Air Force Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, the first Indian astronaut to go to the International Space Station, on Saturday said that the country is rapidly advancing in the field of science and technology and its self-reliance in the domain i... [2149 chars]

articles.title: AASD technology director ready for next chapter
articles.description: Bryce Cossitor is ready for the next chapter of his life after nearly three decades with the Altoona Area School District, from which he will retire Friday as the outgoing technology director. After retirement, Cossitor plans to pursue some consulting work through the Pennsylvania Association of School Business Officials, as well as spend more time […]
articles.content:

articles.title: N.S. company hoping to help reduce risk of wildfires
articles.description: A Nova Scotia company is illustrating how its technology can help reduce the risk of forest fires.
articles.content:
A Nova Scotia company is illustrating how its technology can help reduce the risk of forest fires.
On Friday, BioBurn Pros Inc. demonstrated its mobile system in Hammonds Plains, N.S.

articles.title: Govt funding to catalyse private sector engagement in big way: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent PANCHKULA, Dec 6: At a round table held on the sidelines of the India International Science Festival (IISF) 2025 in Panchkula, Union Minister for Science and Technology Dr Jitendra Singh on Saturday called on industry, investors and researchers to play a more active role in shaping India’s research and innovation landscape, as the Government moves to roll out the Rs 1 lakh crore Research, Development and Innovation (RDI) Fund. Addressing stakeholders from academia, startups and industry, the Minister […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
PANCHKULA, Dec 6: At a round table held on the sidelines of the India International Science Festival (IISF) 2025 in Panchkula, Union Minister for Science and Technology Dr Jitendra Singh on Saturday called on industry, investo... [3101 chars]

articles.title: ‘International Science Festival’ stands for ‘celebration, communication, career making’: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent PANCHKULA, Dec 6: Framing the India International Science Festival around what he described as the three “C’s” – Celebration, Communication and Career – Union Minister for Science and Technology Dr. Jitendra Singh today inaugurated the four-day national science event at Panchkula in Haryana, emphasising that India’s scientific progress must extend beyond laboratories and engage citizens, students and young professionals in a meaningful way. The 11th edition of the festival is being held from December 6 to 9. Addressing […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
PANCHKULA, Dec 6: Framing the India International Science Festival around what he described as the three “C’s” – Celebration, Communication and Career – Union Minister for Science and Technology Dr. Jitendra Singh today inaugu... [4533 chars]

articles.title: APS Samba flags off educational tour
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent SAMBA, Dec 6: Army Public School (APS) Samba today flagged off a four-day educational tour for 160 students accompanied by 12 teachers. The contingent will visit prestigious national institutions including the Indian Military Academy (IMA), Lal Bahadur Shastri National Academy of Administration (LBSNAA), Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC), Forest Research Institute (FRI) and Vigyan Bhawan, Dehradun. The tour aims to provide students with exposure to leadership, administration, science, technology, defence training and environmental studies. Students will interact […]
articles.content:
By
Daily Excelsior
-
Excelsior Correspondent
SAMBA, Dec 6: Army Public School (APS) Samba today flagged off a four-day educational tour for 160 students accompanied by 12 teachers. The contingent will visit prestigious national institutions including... [883 chars]

articles.title: France drone swarms coming
articles.description: France says its armed forces could begin using drone swarms within two years as new battlefield technology and AI systems near operational readiness.
articles.content: It sounds like something straight out of a blockbuster, but it’s very real – and it’s getting close. France could begin using drone swarms in military operations within the next two years, according to both army officials and defence specialists work... [5043 chars]
